navigators.smart.tom.core
Class TOMLayer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      navigators.smart.tom.core.TOMLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, RequestReceiver
public final class TOMLayer
extends java.lang.Thread
implements RequestReceiver

This class implements a thread that uses the PaW algorithm to provide the application a layer of total ordered messages

                TOMRequestReceiver receiver,
                LeaderModule lm,
                Acceptor a,
                ServerCommunicationSystem cs,
                ReconfigurationManager recManager)
Creates a new instance of TOMulticastLayer

Parameters:
manager - Execution manager
receiver - Object that receives requests from clients
lm - Leader module
a - Acceptor role of the PaW algorithm
cs - Communication system between replicas
recManager - Reconfiguration Manager

requestReceived

public void requestReceived(TOMMessage msg)
This method is invoked by the comunication system to deliver a request. It assumes that the communication system delivers the message in FIFO order.

Specified by:
requestReceived in interface RequestReceiver
Parameters:
msg - The request being received

run

public void run()
This is the main code for this thread. It basically waits until this replica becomes the leader, and when so, proposes a value to the other acceptors

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread

decided

public void decided(Consensus cons)
Called by the current consensus's execution, to notify the TOM layer that a value was decided

Parameters:
cons - The decided consensus

checkProposedValue

public TOMMessage[] checkProposedValue(byte[] proposedValue)
Verify if the value being proposed for a round is valid. It verifies the client signature of all batch requests. TODO: verify timestamps and nonces

Parameters:
proposedValue - the value being proposed
Returns:
Valid messages contained in the proposed value

Este metodo e invocado quando ha um timeout e o request ja foi re-encaminhado para o lider

Parameters:
requestList - Lista de pedidos que a replica quer ordenar mas nao conseguiu
